author: Cleo Abram
description:
For the first time ever, scientists have successfully treated Huntington’s disease!

In this trial, scientists inserted a virus containing new DNA into the brain that helps neurons destroy dangerous proteins.

Their data showed the treatment slowed the progression of the disease down by 75% - and this is just the start!

For more optimistic science and tech stories, subscribe.

#shorts #science #geneediting #huntingtons #tech #medicine
title: First Ever Huntington's Treatment!
